alert.note: Alert for Canadian; Cleveland; Oklahoma (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 04 at 6:30AM CDT by NWS Norman-Oklahoma City
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Oklahoma, northwestern Cleveland and southeastern Canadian Counties through 700 AM CDT... At 630 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Yukon, moving southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Southwestern Oklahoma City, Yukon, Bethany, Mustang, Warr Acres, Woodlawn Park, Wiley Post Airport and Will Rogers Airport. This includes the following highways... Interstate 40 between mile markers 131 and 145. Interstate 44 between mile markers 111 and 117. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
